lib.jog

Class graphics.Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.jog.graphics.Image
  • Enclosing class:
    graphics

    public static class graphics.Image
extends java.lang.Object

    jog.graphics.Image

    Essentially an object-orientated wrapper for the slick Texture.

    Author:
    IMP1
    See Also:
    Texture

      • scaledWidth

        public double scaledWidth(double scale)
        Allows access to a scaled value of the width of the image. That is, for when the image is to be scaled to fit a screen size less than that of the target size
        Returns:
        the width of the image in pixels scaled

      • pixelAt

                              int y)
        Allows access to the colours of the pixels in the image data of the texture.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate on the image of the pixel.
        y - the y coordinate on the image of the pixel.
        Returns:
        the colour at the specified pixel.
